5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn ‘Abbas said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘Whoever forgets to send peace and blessings upon me, then he has missed the road to Paradise.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب الصَّلاَةِ عَلَى النَّبِيِّ ـ صلى الله عليه وسلم ـ
chapter.eng-name: Sending peace and blessings upon the Prophet (ﷺ)
